altTitles.ja: こえだめ式のブルース
そんな三千代のマッハⅢ

description.en:
Murata Range's new project! The birth of a monster comic book series that sparks comics × illustrations × video × music!! Contributions from various artists!

**Table Of Contents:**

**Adviser:** Murata Range

**Volume 1**

Cover: Murata Range
1. Hayashida Q - Underground Underground
2. Malter - CONFESSIO
3. Kamo - Awakoi
4. TOKIYA - ACID JPG
5. Takamichi - Eijisu
6. Kataoka Jinsei & Kondou Kazuma - Fabrikbesichtigung
7. Miura Yasuto - Gorogoro
8. JNTHED - 111xx
9. Toume Kei - Skit Scooter
10. Tada Yumi - Ana Clift
11. Author: JD Morvan (Jean-David Morvan), Artist: bengal (Bengal) - congcongcong
12. Shiina You - Iseki Genki ~a daytime vision~
13. Suzumi Atsushi - BLOOM IN BLACK
14. Miggy - The Shape of Happiness
15. Manji - IRIE
16. Touyou Kataoka - Koedame-shiki no Blues
17. JohnHathway - MAGIC ROCKET STATION
18. toi8 - Liar
19. kawayoo - OTOKOYUONn/ayu
20. Mechikuro - 909 / QUEST OF QUAKE
21. Matayoshi - No Makeup

**Volume 2**

Cover: Hayashida Q 

22. Author: Tada Yumi, Artist: Murata Range - The Planetarium In Midsummer
23. Kodama Yuuki - SPOT THE WORLD
24. Itou Yuu & Maeshima Shigeki - Soukiji
25. Igarashi Ran - Elise
26. Takamichi - Eijisu -the latter part-
27. Touyou Kataoka - Sonna Michiyo no Manna San
28. Enomoto - TWILIGHT ZONE
29. Kamo - UbuCos
30. kawayoo - Machiko & Stopko
31. toi8 - Nepentosu
32. Author: Hiramatsu Masaki, Artist: TOKIYA - Astral Mails
33. Matayoshi - Nanatou no Himegimi
34. Mechikuro - 909 / QUEST OF QUAKE
35. Nathan Fox - TTLK
36. JohnHathway - Space logistics
37. Malter - CONFESSIO
38. fuzichoco - Renmei
39. walter - Futuristic
___
**Volume 2 Links:**
- [Official Site (WANIMAGAZINE)](https://www.wani.com/product/138e2/)
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4862692575)
- [CDJapan](https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-1507415)

biography.en: **Name In Native Language:** 平松正樹

**Other Associated Names:**
John Hathway
JH科学
JH-Kagaku

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/JH.kagaku/)

**Name In Native Language:** メチクロ

**Other Associated Names:**
Matic-log
maticlog

Hardware designer and creative director for SF Inc. / MHz.


[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/maticlog/)

**Name In Native Language:** 小玉有起

[Tumblr](https://ktpn.tumblr.com/)
**Name In Native Language:** 卍

**Name In Native Language**: 冬目景
___
She studied at the Tama University of Art in Tokyo. She made her manga debut with 'Rokujô Gekijô', which was printed in the magazine Comic Burger in 1992. The manga won her the Shiki prize in a contest held by Kodansha in 1993. A year later, her follow-up manga 'Mannequin' also won a prize. She started the serial 'Hitsuji no Uta' in Comic Burger in 1995. After the disappearance of this magazine, it was continued in Birz. This serial ran for six years, and was adapted into a radio play and animated film. In 1997, she began 'Yesterday wo Utatte' ('Sing Yesterday For Me'), a manga inspired by a song of the Japanese rock group RC Succession. In addition, Toume contributes to a lot of fanzines and specialized magazines, and is also active in video games and films.
___
**Other Works**:
Character designer for "Giga Wing", a shoot 'em up video game.
biography.es-la:
Estudió en la Universidad de Arte Tama de Tokio. Debutó en el mundo del manga con "Rokujô Gekijô", publicado en la revista Comic Burger en 1992. El manga le valió el premio Shiki en un concurso organizado por Kodansha en 1993. Un año más tarde, su siguiente manga, "Mannequin", también fue premiado. En 1995 comenzó la serie "Hitsuji no Uta" en Comic Burger. Tras la desaparición de esta revista, continuó en Birz. Esta serie duró seis años, y fue adaptada a una obra de radio y a una película de animación. En 1997, comenzó "Yesterday wo Utatte" ("Canta ayer para mí"), un manga inspirado en una canción del grupo de rock japonés RC Succession. Además, Toume colabora en numerosos fanzines y revistas especializadas, y también participa en videojuegos y películas.

Otros trabajos:
Diseñador de personajes para "Giga Wing", un videojuego de disparos.

(Light novel artist &) character designer for the *Ascendance of a Bookworm* series ([Part 1](https://mangadex.org/title/c0ad8919-4646-4a61-adf9-0fd6d8612efa), [Part 2](https://mangadex.org/title/f1311d54-99bc-49ed-b12f-099b9a40c104), [Part 3](https://mangadex.org/title/316d3d09-bb83-49da-9d90-11dc7ce40967), [Part 4](https://mangadex.org/title/85ce7857-3d01-4b0a-adff-7a4cba347ced)).
